text: William Ash (born 13 January 1977) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the role of Christopher Mead in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2009–2011). Prior to this, Ash had starring roles on British dramas such as Making Out (1989–1991), Children's Ward (1989–1991), Soldier Soldier (1993–1994), Where the Heart Is (1997–1998), and Clocking Off (2001–2002). In 2022, he began appearing as Caleb Miligan in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:People from Oldham Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: William Ash (actor)
